attributes.action: stop Tesco building a superstore on every vacant plot of land they see.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tesco stores are blighting the country and forcing small shopkeepers out of business,every town has a Tesco and a Tesco Express. Why don't they give somebody else a chance to make a living?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
